about_the_game:
Synopsis


You are a college student who just returned to school.
Having no friends and not being independent, you regret your past life, but you want to be reborn as a new person through this group project.
Will you be able to succeed?

About This Game

LoveAndComplex is a simulation game set in college.
Like any other simulation game, you can watch all sorts of endings by your choice.

This game can be divided into two parts.

story part

It depends on your choice as a story part or the outcome of your simulation.

simulation part

In the simulation part, you can raise various statistics in preparation for the group project.

Requirements

Windows 7/8/10

Game features


full pixelart graphic
3-4 hour play time
High quality CG

content_descriptors.notes: There is a character's exposure and metaphorical sexual expression.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Any processor w/ a clock rate of 1 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: CPU-integrated or on-board graphics
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 해상도만 지원
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Any processor w/ a clock rate of 1 GHz
  • Graphics: CPU-integrated or on-board graphics
